name.japanese: トラファルガー・ロー

keyMoments.title: Seastone Chain Swap Revealed
keyMoments.description: Law reveals his strategic planning by showing he had swapped real seastone chains with fake ones while staying at Caesar's lab, allowing him to orchestrate the escape.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Law's cunning and long-term strategic thinking, establishing him as a master tactician.
keyMoments.quote: While I freeloaded at Caesar's house, I swapped most of the seastone chains with normal ones.

keyMoments.title: Restores Smoker and Tashigi
keyMoments.description: Law uses his Ope Ope no Mi powers to return Smoker and Tashigi to their original bodies and negotiates their cooperation.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Law's diplomatic skills and creates an uneasy alliance between pirates and Marines.
keyMoments.quote: I have no reason to save you, but if Vergo loses his position due to you returning alive, that would be good.

relationships.description: Law negotiates with Smoker for cooperation in exchange for restoring him to his original body and freedom.

evolutionMoments.description: Law restores Smoker to his body and secures his cooperation against Vergo and Caesar.

relationships.description: Law restores Tashigi to her original body as part of the deal with Smoker.

evolutionMoments.description: Law returns Tashigi to her original body.

reveals.information: Law had secretly swapped seastone chains with fake ones during his stay at Caesar's laboratory

keyMoments.title: Returned to Original Body
keyMoments.description: Law uses his powers to restore Smoker to his original body, ending the body swap situation.
keyMoments.significance: Resolves the body swap subplot and creates an alliance with Law against Vergo and Caesar.

relationships.description: Smoker reluctantly accepts Law's help to survive and bring Vergo to justice.

evolutionMoments.description: Smoker agrees to cooperate with Law in exchange for being restored to his body.

keyMoments.title: Returned to Original Body
keyMoments.description: Law restores Tashigi to her original body. She convinces Smoker to accept Law's deal to save their soldiers and the children.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Tashigi's dedication to justice and protecting innocents.
keyMoments.quote: We have to live in order to protect our soldiers, bring Vergo to justice, and rescue the children.

keyMoments.title: Cuts Laboratory Gate with Kin'emon
keyMoments.description: Zoro coordinates with Kin'emon to cut through the sealed iron laboratory gate, allowing everyone to escape the poison gas.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Zoro's teamwork with another swordsman and his ability to cut through iron.

keyMoments.title: Cuts Laboratory Gate with Zoro
keyMoments.description: Kin'emon demonstrates his ability to cut iron by working with Zoro to slice through the sealed laboratory gate.
keyMoments.significance: Establishes Kin'emon's combat capabilities as a samurai who can cut through iron.

abilities.description: Kin'emon can cut through iron with his sword.

keyMoments.title: Alliance Meeting with Apoo and Hawkins
keyMoments.description: Kid meets with Scratchmen Apoo and Basil Hawkins to discuss forming an alliance between their three pirate crews.
keyMoments.significance: Formation of a major pirate alliance that will impact the New World power structure.

keyMoments.title: Mediates Alliance Meeting
keyMoments.description: Killer acts as mediator when tensions rise between Kid and Apoo, reminding them they came together to form an alliance.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Killer's role as the voice of reason for the Kid Pirates.
keyMoments.quote: The three crews came together to try and form an alliance.

name.japanese: スクラッチメン・アプー

keyMoments.title: Alliance Meeting with Kid and Hawkins
keyMoments.description: Apoo meets with Kid and Hawkins to discuss an alliance, though he initially attacks one of Kid's subordinates.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Apoo's confrontational nature while participating in the alliance formation.
keyMoments.quote: When invited by the enemy, I come expecting a fight.

keyMoments.title: Alliance Meeting with Kid and Apoo
keyMoments.description: Hawkins participates in the alliance meeting but declares the meeting foolish when Kid and Apoo clash.
keyMoments.significance: Shows Hawkins' pragmatic nature despite participating in the alliance talks.

keyMoments.title: Caesar Watches the Escape
keyMoments.description: Caesar watches the captives escape and comments that their corpses will be useful later, showing his overconfidence.
keyMoments.significance: Demonstrates Caesar's arrogance and foreshadows the upcoming confrontation.
keyMoments.quote: What are they doing? How desperate. Their corpses will be useful later.
